A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is a huge let down from start to finish.  From a person who grew up with Star Wars...born in 1971...This movie made me give up caring about Star Wars.  I will not go see or spend my money on the next Star Wars movies.   Some reasons for this movie being that bad...
No answers to who's who\, powers not explained.
Very poor story writing\, many stupid scenes...example being Luke milking a monster and drinking it's titty milk\, pathetic.
Very lazy special affects... backgrounds very generic\, very unrealistic physics\, final battle perfect example of this movies pure laziness.
There are so many reasons I completely hate this movie.  If they just want a annual cash grab...I'll keep my money and I advise you to do the same.
